item.title: Automate your fitness after lockdown
item.description: After the lockdowns started to lift the demand for a space in crossfit classes in my box was very high. I had to set an alarm to be ready to reserve a spot when available. So I tried to automate that process.
item.author: minar@duck.com (Shovon)

item.title: Waving Hand EmojiðŸ‘‹
item.description: I made this animated emoji on the index page. It was surprisingly simple.

item.title: New website! Again??!
item.description: I made another new version of my blog. Not long since I made a big update to it. Now I used next.js. I also moved the blog to the index page so it will be more noticable.
item.author: minar@duck.com (Shovon)
